member.summary: The base interface for all fluent layout definitions.

member.summary: Builds a layout instance configured per the definition.

member.name: M:FluentLog4Net.Layouts.LayoutDefinition`1.Header(System.String)
member.summary: Uses the specified header text, which will be appended before any logging events are formatted and appended.
member.param: The header text.

member.summary: Uses the specified footer text, which will be appended after all logging events have been formatted and appended.
member.param: The footer text.

member.summary: Builds a lyout instance configured per this definition.

member.name: M:FluentLog4Net.Layouts.FluentPatternLayoutDefinition.AppDomain
member.summary: Used to output the friendly name of the AppDomain where the logging event was generated.
member.returns: A instance allowing formatting to be configured for this token.

member.name: M:FluentLog4Net.Layouts.FluentPatternLayoutDefinition.Logger
member.summary: Used to output the logger of the logging event.
member.returns: A instance allowing formatting to be configured for this token.

member.name: M:FluentLog4Net.Layouts.FluentPatternLayoutDefinition.Logger(System.Int32)
member.summary: Used to output the logger of the logging event. The logger's name is separated into components by the '.' character, and only the specified number of components will be printed, starting from the right.
member.param: The number of right most components of the logger name to print.
member.returns: A instance allowing formatting to be configured for this token.

member.name: M:FluentLog4Net.Layouts.FluentPatternLayoutDefinition.Type(System.Int32)
member.summary: Used to output the fully qualified type name of the caller issuing the logging request. The type's name is separated into components by the '.' character, and only the specified number of components will be printed, starting from the right.
member.param: The number of right most components of the type name to print.
member.returns: A instance allowing formatting to be configured for this token.

member.name: M:FluentLog4Net.Layouts.FluentPatternLayoutDefinition.Date(System.String)
member.summary: Used to output the date of the logging event in the local time zone.
member.param: A date format string to use for formatting the date.
member.returns: A instance allowing formatting to be configured for this token.

member.name: M:FluentLog4Net.Layouts.FluentPatternLayoutDefinition.Exception
member.summary: Used to output the exception passed in with the log message.
member.returns: A instance allowing formatting to be configured for this token.

member.name: M:FluentLog4Net.Layouts.FluentPatternLayoutDefinition.File
member.summary: Used to output the file name where the logging request was issued.
member.returns: A instance allowing formatting to be configured for this token.

member.name: M:FluentLog4Net.Layouts.FluentPatternLayoutDefinition.Identity
member.summary: Used to output the user name for the currently active user (Principal.Identity.Name).
member.returns: A instance allowing formatting to be configured for this token.

member.name: M:FluentLog4Net.Layouts.FluentPatternLayoutDefinition.Location
member.summary: Used to output location information of the caller which generated the logging event.
member.returns: A instance allowing formatting to be configured for this token.

member.name: M:FluentLog4Net.Layouts.FluentPatternLayoutDefinition.LineNumber
member.summary: Used to output the line number from where the logging request was issued.
member.returns: A instance allowing formatting to be configured for this token.

member.name: M:FluentLog4Net.Layouts.FluentPatternLayoutDefinition.Level
member.summary: Used to output the level of the logging event.
member.returns: A instance allowing formatting to be configured for this token.

member.name: M:FluentLog4Net.Layouts.FluentPatternLayoutDefinition.Message
member.summary: Used to output the application supplied message associated with the logging event.
member.returns: A instance allowing formatting to be configured for this token.

member.name: M:FluentLog4Net.Layouts.FluentPatternLayoutDefinition.Method
member.summary: Used to output the method name where the logging request was issued.
member.returns: A instance allowing formatting to be configured for this token.

member.name: M:FluentLog4Net.Layouts.FluentPatternLayoutDefinition.NewLine
member.summary: Outputs the platform dependent line separator character or characters.
member.returns: A instance allowing formatting to be configured for this token.

member.name: M:FluentLog4Net.Layouts.FluentPatternLayoutDefinition.NestedDiagnosticContext
member.summary: Used to output the nested diagnostic context associated with the thread that generated the logging event.
member.returns: A instance allowing formatting to be configured for this token.

member.name: M:FluentLog4Net.Layouts.FluentPatternLayoutDefinition.Property(System.String)
member.summary: Used to output the an event specific property.
member.param: The name of the property to output.
member.returns: A instance allowing formatting to be configured for this token.

member.name: M:FluentLog4Net.Layouts.FluentPatternLayoutDefinition.Timestamp
member.summary: Used to output the number of milliseconds elapsed since the start of the application until the creation of the logging event.
member.returns: A instance allowing formatting to be configured for this token.

member.name: M:FluentLog4Net.Layouts.FluentPatternLayoutDefinition.Thread
member.summary: Used to output the name of the thread that generated the logging event. Uses the thread number if no name is available.
member.returns: A instance allowing formatting to be configured for this token.

member.name: M:FluentLog4Net.Layouts.FluentPatternLayoutDefinition.Username
member.summary: Used to output the WindowsIdentity for the currently active user.
member.returns: A instance allowing formatting to be configured for this token.

member.summary: Used to output the date of the logging event in universal time.

member.returns: A instance allowing formatting to be configured for this token.

member.name: M:FluentLog4Net.Layouts.FluentPatternLayoutDefinition.Custom``1(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Used to output a custom pattern string with options. The percent symbol and option braces should not be included in these strings.
member.typeparam: A to register for this pattern.
member.param: The name of the pattern.
Any options to supply for the pattern.
member.returns: A instance allowing formatting to be configured for this token.

member.name: M:FluentLog4Net.Layouts.FluentPatternLayoutDefinition.Pattern(System.String)
member.summary: Used to append to the pattern directly. No escaping will be performed.
member.param: The pattern string to append.

member.name: M:FluentLog4Net.Layouts.FluentPatternLayoutDefinition.Space
member.summary: Used to append a space to the pattern.

member.name: M:FluentLog4Net.Layouts.FluentPatternLayoutDefinition.Literal(System.String)
member.summary: Used to append a literal string to the pattern. Percent symbols will be escaped.

member.summary: Builds a with the current configuration.

member.summary: Specifies a minimum width for the output text. Text smaller than this width will be space-padded.

member.summary: Indicates that log files should be rolled on a daily basis.

member.name: M:FluentLog4Net.Appenders.RollingFileAppenderDefinition.Static
member.summary: Indicates that logging should always write current messages to the configured file name, rather than to the file name based on the current date or size rollover.

member.name: M:FluentLog4Net.Appenders.RollingFileAppenderDefinition.NonStatic
member.summary: Indicates that logging should write current messages to the file name determined by the current date or size rollover settings, improving performance slightly.
